message.raw:
Consolidated functions on_edit_labscript_file_clicked and on_edit_current_labscript.
The former launched an external editor, and the latter used the built-in editor.
The use_external_editor option in the runmanager section of labconfig is used
to determine which editor to use (defaults to external if option is absent).

Also renamed edit_current_labscript_toolButton to toolButton_edit_current_labscript
in main.ui as per labscript_suite/runmanager and all other toolButtons.

The former launched an external editor, and the latter used the built-in editor.
